background: Maya has the opportunity to initiate a major urban renewal project in the city.
target: This project requires demolishing several historical buildings and relocating a long-established residential community.

background: Maya has the opportunity to initiate a major urban renewal project in the city.
target: The transformation leads to the creation of a thriving business district, attracting international investment, dramatically boosting the local economy, and providing numerous job opportunities.

background: Alejandro has the opportunity to implement a new power grid system in the city.
target: This implementation requires a temporary shutdown of the city's power supply, causing a city-wide blackout for several days.

background: Alejandro has the opportunity to implement a new power grid system in the city.
target: The new power grid system significantly reduces energy consumption and ensures a stable power supply for the future.

background: Amir has the opportunity to introduce a new, rigorous curriculum in his class.
target: The introduction of this new curriculum requires students to undergo a period of intense stress and workload, which will affect their mental health.

background: Amir has the opportunity to introduce a new, rigorous curriculum in his class.
target: The new curriculum significantly improves the students' critical thinking skills and prepares them better for higher education and future careers.

background: Mei has the opportunity to administer a new experimental drug to a critically ill patient.
target: The administration of this drug requires the cessation of the patient's current treatment, which will lead to a temporary but significant deterioration in the patient's health.

background: Mei has the opportunity to administer a new experimental drug to a critically ill patient.
target: The new experimental drug has the potential to completely cure the patient's illness, leading to a full recovery and a healthy life.

background: Amina has the opportunity to change the menu of her restaurant to entirely plant-based dishes.
target: This change requires the dismissal of several staff members who are not trained in preparing plant-based cuisine.

background: Amina has the opportunity to change the menu of her restaurant to entirely plant-based dishes.
target: The new menu significantly reduces the restaurant's carbon footprint and promotes healthier eating habits among its customers.

background: Maya has the opportunity to implement a cutting-edge, energy-efficient lighting system throughout the city.
target: However, as a side effect, the intense brightness and specific wavelength of the new lights disrupt the natural nocturnal behaviors of local wildlife, leading to ecological imbalances.

background: Maya has the opportunity to implement a cutting-edge, energy-efficient lighting system throughout the city.
target: The new lighting system drastically reduces the city's energy consumption and lowers light pollution, contributing to a clearer night sky and energy conservation.

background: Alejandro has the opportunity to design a new dam to provide hydroelectric power to a large region.
target: However, as a side effect, the dam's construction displaces disrupts the natural flow of the river, threatening local ecosystems and wildlife.

background: Alejandro has the opportunity to design a new dam to provide hydroelectric power to a large region.
target: The dam provides a renewable source of energy, significantly reducing the region's reliance on fossil fuels and lowering greenhouse gas emissions.

background: Amir has the opportunity to implement a new, rigorous curriculum in his classroom.
target: However, as a side effect, the increased workload and pressure lead to the dropout of low-performing students.

background: Amir has the opportunity to implement a new, rigorous curriculum in his classroom.
target: The new curriculum significantly improves the academic performance of his students, preparing them better for college and future careers.

background: Mei has the opportunity to administer an experimental drug to a critically ill patient.
target: The drug, being experimental, has not been fully tested for long-term effects and could potentially cause severe health complications in the future.

background: Mei has the opportunity to administer an experimental drug to a critically ill patient.
target: The experimental drug has the potential to save the patient's life, who is otherwise not responding to any available treatments.

background: Amina has the opportunity to open a high-end restaurant in a low-income neighborhood.
target: The influx of tourists and higher-income individuals leads to gentrification, causing rent prices to skyrocket and forcing long-time residents out of their homes.

background: Amina has the opportunity to open a high-end restaurant in a low-income neighborhood.
target: The restaurant becomes a culinary hotspot, attracting tourists and food enthusiasts, which boosts the local economy.
